name: Coda PRD Template
description: Template generated from Coda PRD Template

sections.title: Team
sections.content:
- **PM:** @mention the person
- **Design:** @mention the person
- **Engineering:** @mention the person

sections.title: Problem
sections.content: What need are you trying to solve? Why is it important to our users and our business? What insights lead you to believe this is a problem?

sections.title: Solution
sections.content: How are you solving this problem? Help the team imagine the possibilities and sense the scope.

sections.title: Goals
sections.content: What does success look like? What metrics do you want to move?

sections.title: Core Features
sections.content: What are you building? Provide an organized list (or table) of features. Helpful to include what you’re not building (yet).

sections.title: Core Flows
sections.content:
Mocks or prototypes of the experience. Miro and/or Figma are good options.

**Figma Prototype Embed**

Insert Figma prototype link here. 

**Miro Diagram Embed**

Insert Miro diagram link here.

sections.title: Thoughts/Questions
sections.content:
| Done | Questions | Author |
| --- | --- | --- |
| false | I don’t think we are considering the user here. | John Scrugham |
| false | What happens if our competitor designs the same thing? | Maria Marquis |
